name: Loop Heart
description:
Heal broken hearts by shooting heart into the broken hearts while moving in a loop.

Created to participate in Ludum Dare 47 Jam with "Stuck in a Loop" theme.

Control
  • Mouse: Click to shoot a heart. The direction depends on the mouse position.
